review: Xcuse Me (2003) is a very good comedy movie of its time. Of course the standard of comedy has now touched a new level but in 2003 it was a great comedy movie and a bit hit too.
Watched in 2019. An awesome comedy movie. There are hardly any comedy movie in 2018. Bollywood makers must take inspiration from this type of movies.
Best comedy entertainment I never ever seen like this movie in filim history
It is one of the funniest movie in bollywood.

good movie.
just to pass time
